entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 03:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: N 28 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries overnight. Rain along the coast early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm along parts of the coast. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
